# Vitalii Berbeha — E-commerce & Marketing Expert

> Professional portfolio, blog, and news platform by Vitalii Berbeha.

## About

Vitalii Berbeha is an AI project leader and entrepreneur specializing in e-commerce, marketing, and EdTech solutions based in Norway.

## Site Structure

- Homepage: https://vitalii.no/
- News: https://vitalii.no/news — AI, tech, e-commerce news articles (EN/NO/UA)
- Blog: https://vitalii.no/blog — In-depth blog posts on AI, marketing, e-commerce
- Contact: Available via contact form on homepage

## Content

- Multilingual: English, Norwegian (Bokmål), Ukrainian
- Topics: AI, e-commerce, digital marketing, EdTech, technology, startups
- Published news and blog articles with structured data (JSON-LD)

## Technical

- Built with Next.js 15, React 19, TypeScript, Tailwind CSS
- Backend: Supabase (PostgreSQL)
- Deployed on Netlify

## Contact

- Website: https://vitalii.no
- Email: berbeha@vitalii.no
